gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 95, Knicks 89
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Knicks, 95-89. Donovan Mitchell led all scorers with 30 points, along with six rebounds and four assists for the Cavaliers, with Caris LeVert adding 19 points, six rebounds, and five assists in the victory. Jalen Brunson tallied 24 points, four rebounds, and four assists for the Knicks in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 2-3 on the season, while the Knicks fall to 2-3.
